statements: SELECT * FROM UserAccounts;
SELECT name, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM UserAccounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, phone_number FROM UserAccounts WHERE email LIKE 'john%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM UserAccounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND name ILIKE 'a%' ORDER BY phone_number;
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE phone_number IN ('1234567890', '9876543210');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE credential_id = 5;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.name, uc.password_hash FROM users u JOIN user_credentials uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id WHERE u.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY uc.credential_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR name = 'John' AND email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, session_token FROM sessions ORDER BY session_expiry DESC;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE name ILIKE 'John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM passwords;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE name = 'John' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.name, COUNT(s.session_id) AS session_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id GROUP BY u.name ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE user_id = 1 AND password_hash LIKE '%abc123%';
SELECT u.name, p.password_hash, s.session_token FROM users u JOIN passwords p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.name = 'Alice' AND s.session_expiry > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM passwords WHERE password_hash LIKE '%abc%';
SELECT session_id, user_id, expiry_time FROM sessions WHERE expiry_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE password_hash = 'hashed_password';
SELECT users.name, sessions.expiry_time FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.id = sessions.user_id;
SELECT users.name, roles.role_name FROM roles JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail%' AND phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' OR phone_number LIKE '%456%' ORDER BY id DESC;
